column4: hi :)...... need help on an issue, I changed the host name to something else, told me that if i needed to lunch applications I would have to log back in, well I did but it gnome now fails to start, don't know how to make it work with terminal
yeah i tried with hostname but it resets when i reboot back to the screwd up value
am I going to have to reinstall ubuntu? I don't know why this even happened, all I did is change the hostname :(
: graphic utils suck -- but i am an old fart 11yrs linux user lol i hate gui
its odd that that screwd it up, yes i rebooted, tried changing the hostname back through the backup terminal, but it doesn't stick when I reboot
I changed the host name to the exact value of my username, maybe that had something to do with it?
what will that do? right now im windows xp since I cant do anything
k i'll give it a shot, let me just clarify sudo echo"(new name goes here?) >> /etc/hostname:
k didn't work :(, samething, when rebooted, hostname was still the latter
